metadata.title: CVE-2017-9271 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The commandline package update tool zypper writes HTTP proxy credentialsinto its logfile, allowing local attackers to gain access to proxies used.

criterions.comment: zypper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
